title: IModelViewManager.CreateFeatureMgrWindowFromHandle
description: Creates a new view in the FeatureManager design tree using the specified .NET tab control.
signature:
FeatMgrView CreateFeatureMgrWindowFromHandle( 
   System.String
BitMapFile
,
   System.Int32
WindowHandle
,
   System.String
ToolTip
,
   System.Int32
WhichPane
)

parameters.name: BitMapFile
parameters.description: Fully qualified path to the bitmap file that you want to use for the control

parameters.name: WhichPane
parameters.description: Pane to use as defined in swFeatMgrPane_e

remarks:
If your application must be x64 compatible, then use
IModelViewManager::CreateFeatureMgrWindowFromHandlex64
.
